light.description: the default surface colour used for page backgrounds on light mode

dark.description: the default surface colour used for page backgrounds on dark mode

light.description: one level darker on light mode to elevate containers sitting on top of default light surface of white

dark.description: one level lighter on dark mode to elevate containers sitting on top of default dark surface of black

light.description: two levels lighter on dark mode for containers sitting on top of default surface of black and/or surface container for a high contrast but maintains default surface colour of white on light mode - e.g usage could be fill for search bar.

dark.description: two levels lighter on dark mode for containers sitting on top of default surface of black and/or surface container for a high contrast but maintains default surface colour of white on light mode - e.g usage could be fill for search bar.

light.description: stays white on both dark and light mode

dark.description: stays white on both dark and light mode

light.description: two levels darker on light mode for containers sitting on top of default surface of white and/or surface container but maintains default surface colour of black on dark mode - e.g usage could be fill for a item that needs less precedence.

dark.description: two levels darker on light mode for containers sitting on top of default surface of white and/or surface container but maintains default surface colour of black on dark mode - e.g usage could be fill for a item that needs less precedence.

light.description: default text colour for text sitting on most surfaces

dark.description: default text colour for text sitting on most surfaces

light.description: text colour for text that needs less presence sitting on most surfaces

dark.description: text colour for text that needs less presence sitting on most surfaces

light.description: default colour used for system elements like borders and dividers

dark.description: default colour used for system elements like borders and dividers

light.description: colour used for system elements like borders and dividers that need less presence

dark.description: colour used for system elements like borders and dividers that need less presence

light.description: colour used for any disabled elements that do not use brand specific colours

dark.description: colour used for any disabled elements that do not use brand specific colours

light.description: dark text colour fixed on both light and dark mode. For use cases where text sits on top of a highlight / fixed accent colour

dark.description: dark text colour fixed on both light and dark mode. For use cases where text sits on top of a highlight / fixed accent colour

light.description: light text colour fixed on both light and dark mode.

dark.description: light text colour fixed on both light and dark mode.
